jobHistory.name: Artisan's Asylum
jobHistory.title: IT Lead
bulletPoints: Provides continuous IT support, empowering members to focus on innovation without technical interruptions.
Introduces cutting-edge tech solutions to support the creative endeavors of Boston's maker community
Leads IT strategies, laying the technological foundation for future expansions at Artisan's Asylum.
Acts asprimary tech liaison, fostering a collaborative environment for innovation.

jobHistory.name: Cambridge Systematics
jobHistory.title: Software Developer (Associate)
bulletPoints: Fostered team growth by mentoring junior engineers, reviewing code, and providing educational resources.
Led the development of a new booking workflow for improved service customization, and introduced third-party SAML authentication.
Managed and provisioned AWS resources to ensure the reliable operation and deployment of required services.
Optimized database queries, reducing load times and resource usage, and implemented API endpoints following RESTful principles while improving client satisfaction
Designed frontend UI components using Angular and Bootstrap components.

jobHistory.name: Spooky Owl Tech, LLC
jobHistory.title: Founding Developer
bulletPoints: Sought out new clients and drove growth by identifying tech needs and crafting custom solutions.
Pioneered greenfield projects, selecting optimal techstacks for scalability and performance. Languages included NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Django, and React as appropriate
Consistently delivered application features on schedule, enhancing project momentum.
Managed AWS cloud environments, ensuring high reliability and minimal downtime for applications.

jobHistory.name: Trilogy Education
jobHistory.title: Mentor
bulletPoints: Passionately mentored numerous developers, sharing expertise and excitement for technology, while fostering a nurturing learning environment.
Ensured a thorough understanding of coding principles among mentees by delivering in-depth lectures, personalized code reviews, and guidance on key topics.
Introduced novel pair programming techniques to tackle complex assignments, boosting learner engagement and comprehension.

jobHistory.name: Track Information
jobHistory.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
bulletPoints: Focused on the development of serverless technology using Amazon Lambda, NodeJS, and GraphQL, enhancing system efficiency.
Boosted API performance for banking connectivity, ensuring robust tracking of financial transactions.

jobHistory.name: Zipcar
jobHistory.title: Software Engineer
bulletPoints: Modernized an outdated billing system, extracting critical tasks and reimplementing them using Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL.
Boosted API performance for banking connectivity, ensuring robust tracking of financial transactions.

jobHistory.name: Harvard Medical School
jobHistory.title: Senior Software Engineer
bulletPoints: Developed and maintained the Applyhub Platform, allowing researchers to find and apply for medical research grants through the Harvard Catalyst Portal.
Streamlined and automated the addition of new grant offerings using Ruby on Rails and ReactJS, significantly reducing engineering efforts.
Regularly managed zero-downtime deployments of critical services to AWS.

jobHistory.name: Humana
jobHistory.title: Senior Software Engineer
bulletPoints: Implemented new features and created documentation for a competitive wellness tracking application written in NodeJS, ReactNative, and MongoDB.
Optimized services for real-time data tracking, allowing horizontal scaling using message queues, event-based programming, and database sharding.

jobHistory.name: ShareableInk

bulletPoints: Implemented new features and created documentation for a competitive wellness tracking application written in NodeJS, ReactNative, and MongoDB.
